hero.name: Yusuf Gülümser
hero.title: I'm a
hero.description: I'm a passionate software developer specializing in mobile application development. I develop modern and functional mobile applications using React Native. I enjoy designing sleek and smooth interfaces with user experience at the forefront.

about.subtitle: Get to Know Me
about.title: About Me
about.description: Software engineer specialized in mobile application development

story.title: My Story
story.para1: Hello! I'm Yusuf, a software engineer specialized in mobile application development. I love developing modern and functional applications using React Native. I enjoy designing sleek and smooth interfaces with user experience at the forefront.
story.para2: Throughout my career, I've gained proficiency in various programming languages such as C++, Java, Kotlin and JavaScript. I've particularly specialized in mobile application development with React Native framework and have successfully delivered numerous projects.
story.para3: I work as a software engineer at Eteration company. I manage professional software development processes and take an active role in real-world projects such as ReportBack. With my passion for mobile app development and desire for continuous learning, I continue to make a difference in the industry.

continuousLearning.description: Passion for learning new technologies and developing myself

passion.title: Passion

eteration.title: Software Engineering Intern
eteration.description: Worked on the ReportBack mobile application with React Native, focusing on UI development and feature integration. Contributed to company internal projects using NestJS and React Native technologies.

personal.title: Mobile Application Developer
personal.description: Working as a freelance developer, designing and developing full-stack mobile applications. Created various successful projects including AI-powered note-taking app and carpet cleaning service app with complete backend solutions.

education.title: Software Engineering Student
education.description: Received comprehensive education in software development. Gained proficiency in programming languages such as C++, Java, Kotlin and JavaScript.

skills.subtitle: What I Can Do
skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: Creating creative solutions with modern technologies and programming languages

mobileApp.title: Mobile Application Development
mobileApp.description: Modern and performant mobile applications with React Native

projects.subtitle: Portfolio
projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some projects I've developed using modern technologies and best practices.

moreProjects.title: More Projects
moreProjects.description: You can check out more projects and my contributions on my GitHub profile

carpet.title: Gülümser Carpet Cleaning
carpet.description: Full-featured mobile application developed for carpet cleaning services. Comprehensive order management system with customer and admin panels, featuring real-time tracking and automated notifications.
carpet.longDescription: This application developed with React Native offers a comprehensive solution for managing carpet cleaning services. Express.js backend provides user authentication, order management and real-time updates. Push notifications and live order tracking are possible with Firebase integration.

notly.title: NotlyAi - AI Note App
notly.description: Smart note-taking app with OpenAI integration. Advanced AI-powered note categorization, intelligent summarization, and interactive smart chat features for enhanced productivity.
notly.longDescription: This AI-powered note app developed with React Native helps users to intelligently categorize and summarize their notes. It offers natural language processing, content summarization, language correction and reminder creation features from notes with OpenAI integration.

dreamCatcher.title: Dream Catcher AI
dreamCatcher.description: AI-based dream analysis app. A unique and immersive mobile experience where users can record their dreams and receive personalized insights through advanced AI analysis and pattern recognition.
dreamCatcher.longDescription: This unique app developed using OpenAI API allows users to record their dreams and analyze them with artificial intelligence. It offers modern interface design and user-centered experience.

reportback.title: ReportBack - Eteration
reportback.description: Professional reporting application where I contributed to AI chat support integration and UI development during my internship at Eteration, focusing on creating a seamless user experience.
reportback.longDescription: Mobile application project developed in a professional environment. Built with React Native, I made significant contributions especially in AI-powered chat system integration and UI development.

mealExplorer.title: Meal Explorer App
mealExplorer.description: Recipe discovery app. Responsive interface design with dynamic category filtering and favorite management system.
mealExplorer.longDescription: Recipe app developed with React Native. Allows users to discover recipes, filter by categories and use the favorite system.

atmSimulator.title: ATM Simulator
atmSimulator.description: Mobile app that simulates ATM operations. Transaction data management with SQLite and basic ATM functions.
atmSimulator.longDescription: ATM simulator app developed for educational purposes. It simulates basic ATM operations and manages transaction history with SQLite database.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's Discuss Your Project Ideas
contact.description: Planning a new project? Get in touch and let's develop your dream application together.

footer.description: Software engineering student specialized in mobile application development with React Native. I create creative solutions with modern technologies.
